short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn while you work with real-time recruitment advice and insights from the Savage Recruitment Academy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Savage Recruitment Academy (SRA) extension is designed to help recruiters enhance their skills and receive expert advice in real-time while staying productive in their daily workflow.

With features from SRA Coach, users can access the entire SRA video library and get instant answers to recruitment questions through the Ask Greg feature. This unique tool delivers expert advice from Greg Savage’s extensive content, ensuring users receive credible, proven solutions in critical moments.

Seamlessly integrating with platforms like Gmail, LinkedIn, JobAdder, Bullhorn, and more, SRA helps recruiters tackle challenges as they arise. Whether negotiating with a client or managing a candidate offer, the SRA extension ensures you’re equipped with the right advice.

The Talk to Greg AI assistant further enhances the experience by offering real-time, voice-driven answers, making it feel like you have a recruitment mentor. Plus, with the ability to share learning content, team collaboration and knowledge-sharing become effortless.

The SRA extension empowers recruiters to upskill and solve challenges without interrupting their workflow, making learning truly integrated and efficient.

Love the way you learn!
